name: KlasWallet
description: KlasWallet is a production-grade digital asset hub designed for individuals and merchants. Manage NGN, USD, and major cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC) with institutional-grade security. Integrated with Bani.africa for seamless on/off-ramps, featuring a double-entry ledger system, tiered KYC, and an AI-powered financial advisor for smart asset management.
